participant_1.background:
I've started bringing a snack to work so I'm not starving by the time my students arrive.
my dad owns a appliance store that i do not want to inherit.
my grandson s favorite type of cake is chocolate.
I love my family and friends because they support me and help me grow.
my favorite season is duck hunting season.

participant_2.background:
I'm a couch potato who loves Jimmy Fallon and the Raptors.
My sunflowers are a source of pride for me, but my family's income comes from my job as a farmer.
i work in the pharmaceutical industry.
I don't talk to my family anymore.
I like a soft bed for my baby.

content.text: Hey there! My day is going well, thank you for asking! How is yours?
It's going great! I'm a teacher and I'm really excited for my students to arrive.
That's awesome! I'm a farmer and I'm really excited for my sunflowers to bloom.
Oh that's so cool! I love sunflowers.
Thanks! I'm really proud of them.
What's your favorite thing to do in the fall?
I love going to football games!
Me too! I'm a huge fan of the Raptors.
Oh wow! They're my favorite team too!
That's awesome! We should go to a game together sometime.
I'm free this weekend if you are.
